pages.text: The Tainted Enchanting Table is the most important block in the mod. It allows for the creation of new items and enchantments.

The Tainted Enchanting Table can extract enchantments from enchanted items, rendering the original item un-enchantable. You can transfer enchantments by using an item that has already lost its enchanting ability.$(br2) You can place on the Tainted Enchanting Table up to 8 items, and they will rotate around it.
